history.title: Calculator History
history.profitTrendDescription: Profit trend based on 100,000 it/s calculating the average weekly earnings of each pool

error.poolDataUnavailable: Pool data is currently unavailable, please try again later

hashRate.tooltip: Calculated based on the average Hashrate of each mining pool to statistics, and there may be some efficiency differences between CPU Hashrate and GPU Hash rate.

performance.tooltip: Performance efficiency refers to the ratio of the number of blocks mined from the specified mining start time to the current time and the expected number of blocks, with the default start time being the epoch start time.

expectedCurrentCoins.tooltip: The expected coins are calculated based on statistical data and mining pool fees, but do not represent final earnings; the operation status of the mining pool may also affect earnings.

expectedCurrentBlocks.tooltip: The expected current block count refers to the estimated number of blocks from the mining start time set in your current pool to now.

profitAnalysis.tooltip: Profit analysis is only a preliminary estimate affected by various data factors. Please take the actual profit as the standard.

title.tooltip: Here is a list of available mining pools, you can choose one to join mining.
Since some mining pools are small and have significant data fluctuations, the current data only includes mining pools with total hash rate share of over 5%

qli.name: QLI Pool
qli.description: In the Qubic ecosystem, QLI Pool is currently the largest mining pool with the most users. It offers various income distribution methods and supports multiple mining modes; you can easily find answers to all kinds of questions. This pool is compatible with operating systems such as LINUX, WIN (Windows), and HIVEOS.

apool.name: Apool
apool.description: Apool.io is a technology platform focusing on blockchain mining services, committed to providing users with efficient, safe, and stable pool solutions. Currently, the platform supports various cryptocurrency mining, including QUBIC, ALEO, etc., helping users maximize their Hashrate utilization and optimize earnings. Since its launch, Apool.io has been renowned for its stability, offering sustained and substantial income guarantees to users, as well as 24/7 technical support services, quickly responding to user needs and resolving issues encountered during the mining process.

solutions.name: Solutions
solutions.description: Qubic.Solutions is the second-ever mining pool for Qubic, operating since 2023. We provide a reliable and efficient mining experience for miners looking to participate in the network. Our pool ensures fair rewards, stable performance, and real-time monitoring to maximize your mining efficiency.

minerlab.name: MinerLab
minerlab.description: Qubic Lab, managed by MinerLab.io, is a mining pool tailored for the Qubic blockchain, supporting both CPU and GPU mining. It offers high yields for mining operations and is designed to be compatible with various hardware configurations. The platform emphasizes scalability, efficiency, and community-driven innovation, simplifying blockchain accessibility while ensuring robust performance for miners and developers alike.

nevermine.name: Nevermine
nevermine.description: Nevermine.io is your trusted crypto mining pool, designed for miners who demand efficiency, transparency, and reliability. With industry-leading uptime, low fees, and a commitment to complete transparency, we ensure you get the most out of your mining efforts. Our dedicated support team is always ready to assist, making Nevermine.io the ultimate choice for miners who never settle for less.

hashratePerSolution.title: Daily Hashrate for Solution
hashratePerSolution.tooltip: The hashrate required for one Solution per day based on pool data

corrected_hashrate.tooltip: Adjusted Total Network Hashrate Based on Pool Data

noProposal.title: Current No Proposals
noProposal.description: Currently, there are no proposals available for voting

price.tooltip: average price of the latest transactions of assets
